description: Due to technical changes, the BBC Sport Live Guide is no longer available.
title: Due to technical changes, the BBC Sport Live Guide is no longer available.
title_page: Due to technical changes, the BBC Sport Live Guide is no longer available. - BBC Sport
maintext:
How can I find the latest live events?
Many live pages are available on our teams and competition pages, including:
Football teams page
Football competitions page
Cricket teams page
Rugby union teams page
Rugby league teams page
For any teams or sports you follow in the BBC Sport app you will receive all the latest live pages and updates in your 'My Sport' section.
